titles.title: A resolution commending the University of Southern California Trojans football team for winning the 2004 Bowl Championship Series national championship game.
A resolution commending the University of Southern California Trojans football team for winning the 2004 Bowl Championship Series national championship game.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Commends the University of Southern California Trojans football team for winning the 2004 Bowl Championship Series national championship game.
